name: Apple Crisp Cocktail
description: This autumnal highball from Union Square Cafe in NYC brings together Laird's bonded apple brandy with bourbon that's been infused with spicy green cardamom pods.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup bourbon, such as Buffalo Trace
1 ounce Laird's 100 proof apple brandy (not Applejack)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the Cardamom-Infused Bourbon: Place ¼ cup cardamom pods in a resealable jar. Crush with a wooden spoon to crack about half the pods (this can also be done in a mortar and pestle.) Top with 1 cup bourbon, shake, infuse for 1 1/2 hours at room temperature. Strain through a fine mesh strainer, discard solids, and re-bottle bourbon.
To make the cocktail: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add apple brandy, cardamom-infused bourbon, lemon juice, and honey syrup. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with soda and garnish with lemon twist.
